title: Grateful Dead Live at Oakland Auditorium Arena on 1981-12-27
lineage: Master Audience Cassettes (Nakamichi CR-7A) > Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz)> dBpoweramp 2496 > Adobe Audition CC2020 > TLH flac2496
source: Mark Severson & Jaime Poris's Master Audience Cassettes; Nakamichi 700 mics x3 (Left/Right cardioids 6db EQ, Center omni) 35' feet from stage (at the free throw line) > Jaime Poris's custom built mixer > Sony D5M (Maxell MX-90's)
